    Travel and claims information

    How to get to Bath See here for instructions how to get to Bath. Please email Phil Trinh (hppt20@bath.ac.uk), Eric Hester (eh2450@bath.ac.uk), and Josh Shelton (js2317@bath.ac.uk) if you intend to come by car and require a parking permit for Bath University Campus for the day.
    Claims
    Please complete the claims form here and email our department coordinators maths-enquiries@bath.ac.uk with receipts and a suitable subject line like "AIMS travel claim for X". Please Cc the organisation team and we will then be able to follow-up with the departmental coordinators in case there are any issues: Phil Trinh (hppt20@bath.ac.uk), Eric Hester (eh2450@bath.ac.uk), and Josh Shelton (js2317@bath.ac.uk)
